item.title: Corned Beef and Cabbage
item.description: A traditional Irish dinner. Corned beef and cabbage and Saldo. (Well maybe not that last bit…) Yes, it‚Äôs a cheat during Great Lent. But it‚Äôs also a long established family tradition. And St. Patrick is a special patron of ours. For dessert, s‚Äômores over the stove, as we missed our chance for brownies today, and I neglected to hoard ice cream during the quarantine. No matter, they were delicious. Happy St.

item.title: Make a Wish
item.description: Go ahead, now’s your chance. It’s the season.
